manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 365 by Whole Foods Market 365 by Whole Foods Market products give you that dance-down-the-aisles feeling. Our huge range of choices with high-quality ingredients at prices you can get down with makes grocery shopping so much more than tossing the basics in your cart. It’s the splurgiest way to save.

Next-Level Necessities Our basics are anything but. You won’t find hydrogenated oils or FD&C colors in our products — just quality staples with nothing to hide. There’s an Organic for That We’ve got organics and non-GMO products at prices that won’t burn a hole in your favorite pants. In fact, they’ll turn into boogie-on-aisle-six pants. Body Care You Can Bank On We ban 215+ ingredients commonly used in beauty and body products including parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde donors, oxybenzone, PFAS and EDTA. Awesomeness on Every Aisle Whole grains, fair trade coffee, organic milk, frozen veggies and so much more, all flexing with our unmatched Whole Foods Market Quality Standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good, cleans well.
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it lathers up. Smells good.The ingredients and the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the Price!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many high end shampoos and this shampoo is AMAZING. It is my new go to. It leaves my hair feeling fresh and with this much hair that is a must. It doesn't add much volume but it does leave it clean. The smell is amazing too- it is like a tea tree oil and fresh.10/10 will be buying again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent daily shampoo
reviews.reviewText: It’s decent for daily use. Not necessarily anything special but okay for daily usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work well for me
reviews.reviewText: I don't know if it's a PH balance sort of thing or what, but some shampoos don't work with my hair. Some shampoos leave a thick residue behind, leaving my hair with a horrible waxy feeling and heavy coating of gunk all over. I have very fine hair, very soft, and it grows thick on my head. Shampoos and conditioners that leave behind "moisturizers" (or whatever) often leave my hair feeling heavy, flat, or not rinsed off well (and hard water is awful for my hair)._THIS_ shampoo doesn't quite do that, but it does not rinse out very well. There is a slight residue, and it gets better with a second lather and rise, but it doesn't rise out thoroughly well, leaving my hair feeling a little heavy and not as clean as it should be. It's passable, I can dry my hair and leave the house, but I'm not pleased with it.This might work for some, but it doesn't for me. I would recommend a small bottle before buying a large one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: I've only used this a few days, but my shedding has already decreased by a lot. There hasn't been a noticeable increase in volume yet, but I'd assume the less I shed the thicker my hair will be. I have a lot of hope in this shampoo. The smell is pleasant, and the bottle is big. Good value. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pump did not work. How challenging is it to put a working pump on a bottle? When you unscrew the whole mechanism to get to the shampoo, it is a disappointment. My hair looked greasy and flat after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo n conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I have this shampoo and conditioner it's added fullness and moisture to my hair and it looks great i will continue to use it. Love it thank you
